attributes.additional_details: This e-petition has been raised to make the government more aware of the lack of action currently being taken to repair Service Family Accommodation to a satisfactory standard. If you look on certain social media sites, you will see there are already small splinter groups trying to highlight this problem without success. I would like the government to investigate the complaints currently logged with the company "Modern Housing Solutions" and ensure the company is fulfilling its obligations in accordance with government legislation.
